newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian zinc output steady in April-September.
newsitem.headline: Indian zinc output steady in April-September.

text.p: India's zinc production in the first six months of fiscal 1996/97 (April-March) remained steady at 64,185 tonnes against 64,187 tonnes in the same period in 1995/96, a mines ministry statement said on Wednesday.
The government had set a target of 74,650 tonnes of zinc production for the period between April and September 1996.
India's state-owned and private firms produced 11,983 tonnes of the metal in September 1996 against a target of 14,200 tonnes, the statement said.
